title: BIM Competency Enhancement Program for Interior Design Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental interior design principles and experience in creating 2D drawings
context.additional_context: Modular content design considering mobile-device-centric learning environments, enhancing field adaptability through practical project applications

learning_goals: Learners can progressively utilize BIM core functionalities according to the cognitive-associative-autonomous stages of ACT-R theory
Learners can virtually simulate spatial components using mobile-optimized BIM tools
Learners can design BIM-based collaborative workflows for actual interior projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
